entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
